name: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage
overview: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage (セガ3D復刻アーカイブス3 FINAL STAGE) is a Nintendo 3DS game developed by M2 and published by Sega. It is a compilation of eleven ported Sega games and the third and final game in the Japanese only Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives series. The compilation was released exclusively in Japan on 22 December 2016, a year after Sega 3D Classics Collection. Like its predecessors, the code for the games were rebuilt instead of just emulated, so they could allow new features such as stereoscopic 3D.
